mapper.sql: iid, clistingid, csku, ikey, ivalue, ccreateuser, dcreatedate
mapper.select: select * from t_product_entity_map tentity inner join t_attribute_key_name tkey on tentity.ikey=tkey.ikeyid and tkey.ilanguageid=#{1} inner join t_attribute_value_name tvalue on tentity.ivalue= tvalue.ivalueid and tvalue.ilanguageid=#{1} inner join t_product_multiattribute_sku tsku on tsku.csku = tentity.csku inner join t_product_multiattribute_attribute tma on tsku.cparentsku =tma.cparentsku and tentity.ikey = tma.ikey where tma.iwebsiteid=#{2} and tentity.clistingid in #{item}
mapper.insert: insert into t_product_entity_map ( clistingid, csku, ikey, ivalue, ccreateuser, dcreatedate,multiattribute,bshow) values ( #{clistingid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ikey,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ivalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ccreateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dcreatedate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{multiattribute,jdbcType=BIT},#{bshow})

insert into t_product_entity_map (clistingid, csku,ikey, ivalue,iwebsiteid,bshow, ccreateuser, dcreatedate,multiattribute) values
(#{item.clistingid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.csku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ikey,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.ivalue,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.iwebsiteid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.bshow}, #{item.ccreateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dcreatedate,jdbcType=DATE},#{item.multiattribute,jdbcType=BIT})

insert into t_product_entity_map
iid,
clistingid,
csku,
ikey,
ivalue,
iwebsiteid,
bshow,
multiattribute,
ccreateuser,
dcreatedate,
